attributes.action: Increase the speed limit from 70mph to at least 90mph.
attributes.additional_details:
http://youtu.be/bvtvfSJi2fg
Top gear on speed cameras

http://youtu.be/KGkKDaYd3Mo
Top gear on stopping distances
attributes.background:
The 70mph limit was introduced in 1965 which is looking out of date due to the huge advances in safety, equipment and motoring technologies.

Increasing the speed from 70mph to at least 90mph, will shorten journey times and increase economic benefits and growth.
